article.title: BAE to Sustain Viper Memory Loader Verifier
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronic Systems, Nashua, New Hampshire, is being awarded a $25,000 million multiple award indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for sustainment of Viper memory loader verifier and enhanced diagnostic aid support equipment.Â The 748 Supply Chain Management Group is the contracting activity.
